content: As an optional battle, Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw is located very close to the start of Chapter 2 in the Yellow Wind Ridge. As soon as you arrive, you can head along the brackish pond water to its very end, where you'll find the Frog Guai in a large watery pit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw.md', within the main section titled 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
As an optional battle, Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw is located very close to the start of Chapter 2 in the Yellow Wind Ridge. As soon as you arrive, you can head along the brackish pond water to its very end, where you'll find the Frog Guai in a large watery pit.
